definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[אתי]], i.e. [[אַתִּי]], the older & more original form of [[אַתְּ]]  thou (fem.), preserved, prob. dialectically, 7 t. in Kt, Ju Jdg 17:2, 1Ki 14:2, 2Ki 4:16, 2Ki 4:23, 2Ki 8:1, Je 4:30, Ez Eze 36:13. (V. supr. As in Syr., the [[י]] may not have been fully sounded: the Massorites direct [[אַתְּ]] to be everywhere read.)
